title: Adamantine Scimitar
content:
Adamantine Scimitar Rare 2~7 Damage 1d6+1 Slashing Diamondsbane: If an adamantine weapon hits an object, the hit is always critical. Lethal Weapon: This weapon ignores Resistance to Slashing damage. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Each cut of this blade shines with the wicked glint of adamantine - a promise for a devastating blow. Scimitar Light Finesse 1.35 190
